'''12w42b''' is the fifteenth and final [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.4.2]], released on October 18, 2012<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/20121022082301/http://www.mojang.com/2012/10/minecraft-snapshot-12w42b-preprerelease/</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in the [[12w42a]] snapshot.

== Additions ==
=== Mobs ===
'''[[Bat]]s '''
* Added sounds.

'''[[Silverfish]]'''
* Added step sound.

'''[[Zombie]]s'''
* Added three new sound effects.

'''[[Zombie pigmen]]'''
* Added sounds.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Sound]]s'''
* Added a number of sound events, but the sound effects are not added yet.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Redstone repeater]] '''
* Lock mechanism is now slightly more stable and predictable.

'''[[Sand]]'''
* Falling sand now properly "pops" when falling on non-solid blocks (such as [[torch]]es).

=== General ===
'''[[Server]]s'''
* Server ping now tells if the server and client have mismatching protocol versions.

'''Translations'''
* Updated translation files.

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed tooltip width for renamed items.</onlyinclude>
